layer.name: Responsibility
layer.definition: If it's in your life, it's yours to address.

answers.4: mostly my responsibility, though some things aren't
answers.5: my responsibility for what I can control
answers.2: influenced by factors I can't do much about
answers.3: partly my responsibility, partly beyond my control

questions.text: When my health suffers, it's usually because of ...

answers.4: my choices, though some factors are real
answers.2: factors I didn't choose and can't change
answers.3: some things I can't control, some choices I've made

questions.text: When my body needs attention, I ...

answers.4: care for it, though not always promptly
answers.5: care for it — it's worth caring for
answers.2: wish I didn't have to deal with it
answers.3: sometimes care for it, sometimes resent the need

questions.text: Integrated wellness — physical, mental, spiritual — is ...

answers.4: my responsibility, though I don't always integrate well
answers.2: hard to pursue with everything else demanding attention
answers.3: something I value, but I tend to compartmentalize
answers.1: an ideal, but I can only focus on one area at a time

questions.text: Preventive care and maintenance for my body is ...

answers.4: my responsibility, though I'm not always consistent
answers.5: my responsibility — I don't wait for breakdown
answers.2: hard to prioritize when nothing feels wrong
answers.3: something I do sometimes, but mostly when there's a warning sign
answers.1: something I'll get to when something breaks
